name: lab-machine-troubleshoot
description: Debugging access to the CPE lab machines for systems programming

events.content: Anyone else getting denied when SSHing into the cpe lab machines? I followed the lab 2 directions but keep getting permission denied (publickey).
Make sure you added your public key to https://linux-login.csc.calpoly.edu and checked the box for "357" access. It takes about 5 minutes to propagate.
I added it this morning. Do I need to use a specific host name?
Use `cpe-01.csc.calpoly.edu`. If that’s full try 02 or 03. Also double check your key permissions: `chmod 600 ~/.ssh/id_ed25519`.
If it still fails email support@csc.calpoly.edu with your username. They’ll reset your unix account - mention you’re in CSC 357.
Got it working after the chmod. Thanks everyone!
